nodes.name: CryptoTraderInternal

nodes.documentation: @notice Restart competition after current one has been closed.
nodes.name: _restartCompetition

nodes.documentation:
@notice Find the competition winner (the one who has the bigger balance) and return it.
 @return address payable (winner)
nodes.name: _getWinner

nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculate the total balance of a trader in virtual coin.
 @return uint
nodes.name: _getTotalBalance

nodes.documentation: @notice Restart competition after current one has been closed.
nodes.name: _restartCompetition

devdoc.author: Quentin Brunet, Pierre Piron, Léo Legron, Prescilla Lecurieux

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: InternalContract for CryptoTrader. Extends CryptoTraderBase. Defines internal functions.

getPrice().notice: Allow anyone to get real currency current price in Ether.

userdoc.notice: Student project, may contain bugs and security issues.
